alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 2:20PM CDT until May 06 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas...Oklahoma... Arkansas River at Ozark Lock and Dam affecting Logan, Franklin and Johnson Counties. Lee Creek near Van Buren affecting Crawford and Sequoyah Counties. Arkansas River at Van Buren affecting Sebastian and Crawford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lee Creek near Van Buren. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 402.0 feet, the access road into Tailwater Park may be impassable due to high water. The recreational vehicle campground near Rena Road is affected by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:39 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 401.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 402.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 401.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
